item.title: How to make gses hit harder with spec
item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

chamge the “specialdmg = (minDMGammount) + misc.random(ExtraAmmount)” to something else…
and i already explained what everything means too (hopefully) i dont use specs on my server so dont blame me
also: if you have specials.java then search there for “specialdmg” or specialdamage" but if you dont… then search client.java hope it helped!

Read full topic
